name: Pixel ZigZag Cars 3D
description:
Tap or touch to turn the car, collect coins and try to catch all cars!

Road continues with zigzag shape and car becomes fast soon. Be careful and don't crash!

There are six different funny cars, unlock and enjoy all of them.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive cool action racing game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
